item.title: AI Development and Consulting
item.description: AI is new databases, web applications, cloud applications, etc, but 100 times bigger. Each organizations soon will need it’s own AI solutions for the specific needs.

item.title: Custom Software Development
item.description: When you need a comprehensive software solution created from scratch, our Custom Software Development service is your choice. This service includes a wide range of offerings:

item.title: Web Development Consulting
item.description: This option is suitable for any organization that needs external expertise and guidance. We can offer any assistance with Software Development Life Cycle or with related business needs:

item.title: How We Work
item.description: We offer three different types of software development services, each catering to different levels of technical expertise and engagement from our side and providing related business services: hiring, accounting, legal support, equipment, schedule.

item.title: Let's talk!
item.description: Please, reach us via email and we will definitely talk! CEO: vadym@abstract-factory.xyz CMO: vlevin@abstract-factory.xyz

item.title: Our team
item.description: Our team of software experts is strategically based in Eastern Europe, ensuring a potent combination of quality-focused services and cost-effectiveness. Additionally, our Chief Marketing Officer is situated in Florida, providing convenient accessibility and support within a more suitable time zone for our clients.

item.title: Team Enhancment
item.description: The Team Enhancement service is ideal for you if you already have a project and a team. This service is designed for clients who need additional team members to strengthen their existing structure.
